title: Account specific login error
body:
Dear players/mods,

I tried logging in today after a night of playing league with friends but it keeps saying "Can not connect to login queue" on the client, and the same when I try to log in on here (site). 

I tried testing to see if its my connection so I logged onto my other account, both client and site allowed me to log in. 

What is going on?

replies.body:
This may be caused by a bug with the *Beta Client* that prevents you from receiving a Leaverbuster Message, preventing login. You should be able to resolve this by logging into your affected account after launching into the Legacy Client from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this fixed it!

Hey there! Thank you for your reply I appreciate it.

I logged into the affected account in legacy - it lets me log in with no problem there.

I am however, still unable to log into the beta client as well as the website (hence why im on this account) on forums.
I suspect that if you play a match via the Legacy Client, you should finally receive that notification and resolve the issue logging into the Beta Client. Give it a go and let me know if it worked.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pp1whHUV,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-03T22:30:23.537+0000)
>
> I suspect that if you play a match via the Legacy Client, you should finally receive that notification and resolve the issue logging into the Beta Client. Give it a go and let me know if it worked.

Another note ontop of my last post, it seems I am not the only player experiencing this problem. Some users under this thread is also having account specific login issues:

First: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gfOEfv4F-cant-log-in

Second: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/12sHlrWT-i-cannot-log-in

> [{quoted}](name=T1 Schen,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gfOEfv4F,comment-id=000e0000000100000000,timestamp=2017-01-04T05:28:06.958+0000)
>
> it is already two days,and when I login the new client,it said unable to connect ,and the website said an error occurred.....

That's correct, there are others experiencing similar issues, which prompted us to start investigating. Since playing a match on the Legacy Client didn't cause any change for you, I'd strongly recommend we escalate this to our specialists via a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), where we'll be able to look into this further.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks Targons Blade, I'm just very glad that you guys prompted an investigation. (I've submitted a ticket as well)

Hey! 

I've played multiple games already on the legacy client with the affected account. I also shouldn't have gotten any leaver buster notification because I haven't afk'd or left a match in well over a year at least. 

I appreciate your responses, please let me know what I should try do next
